itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer are joined by MMA Legend Jeremy Horn as they discuss why Starbucks decided to hire 10,000 refugees over 10,000 veterans. Evan gets into hot water online over a meme.
